kick.message:
You have been kicked from {server} 
 Reason: "*{reason}*".
kick.lower_role: You need a higher position to kick this member.
kick.target_owner: You can't kick the server owner.

ban.ban_message:
You have been banned from {guild} 
 Reason: "*{reason}*".
ban.target_owner: You can't ban the server owner.
ban.lower_role: You need a higher position to ban this member.

slowmode.invalid_duration: Duration cannot be longer than 6 hours.
slowmode.invalid_channel: Slowmode cannot be set on this channel.

timeout.invalid_duration: Duration cannot be longer than 28 days
timeout.target_owner: You can't timeout the server owner.
timeout.lower_role: You need a higher position to timeout this member.
